```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(raster)
library(here)
library(rgdal)
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
climate_raster <- raster(here("data/climate_scenarios/lasso_data_9/LOCA_rcp85_eparegion9_MIROC-ESM_r1i1p1_pr_pctchg_2041_2070_1981_2010_Annual.tif"))

plot(climate_raster)
```

```{r}
ogrListLayers(here("data/NPL_Boundaries.gdb"))

superfund_locations <- readOGR(here("data/NPL_Boundaries.gdb"), layer = "SITE_FEATURE_LINES_SF")
# all obersvations the same?

superfund_coords <- st_as_sf(superfund_locations, coords = c("x", "y"))


ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = superfund_coords)
```
